title: Cart Abandoned Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.cart_abandoned event. Fired when a user abandons their shopping cart without completing a purchase.

cartId.description: The unique identifier of the shopping cart.

products.description: The list of products in the abandoned cart.

total.description: The total monetary value of the abandoned cart.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the cart total (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

itemCount.description: The number of distinct items in the cart.

cartAge.description: The time since the cart was created, in seconds.

lastActivityAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last cart interaction.

abandonmentPage.description: The page or checkout step where the user abandoned the cart.

coupon.description: The coupon code applied to the cart, if any.
